atk-abh03a49:1_0: Idāni tesaññeva mūlayamake desitānaṁ kusalādidhammānaṁ labbhamānavasena ekadesaṁ saṁgaṇhitvā dhammayamakānantaraṁ
atk-abh03a49:1_3: Idhāpi hi paṇṇattivārādayo tayo mahāvārā avasesā antaravārā ca saddhiṁ kālappabhedādīhi khandhayamakādīsu āgatasadisāva.
atk-abh03a49:1_4: Indriyānaṁ pana bahutāya dhātuyamakatopi bahutarāni yamakāni honti.
atk-abh03a49:1_5: Yathā pana heṭṭhā puggalavārādīsu cakkhāyatanacakkhudhātumūlake naye cakkhāyatanacakkhudhātūhi saddhiṁ jivhāyatanakāyāyatanāni na yojitāni.
atk-abh03a49:1_7: tathā idhāpi cakkhundriyamūlake naye jivhindriyakāyindriyāni na yojitāni,
atk-abh03a49:1_9: Tesaṁ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:1_10: Manindriyaṁ pana yathā cakkhundriyādimūlakehi tatheva itthindriyādimūlakehipi saddhiṁ yasmā yojanaṁ gacchati,
atk-abh03a49:1_11: tasmā nikkhittapaṭipāṭiyā ayojetvā sabbehipi cakkhundriyamūlakādīhi saddhiṁ pariyosāne yojitanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:1_12: Cakkhundriyena saddhiṁ itthindriyapurisindriyajīvitindriyāni yojitāni sukhindriyadukkhindriyadomanassindriyāni paṭisandhiyaṁ natthīti na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a49:1_15: Lokuttarāni tīṇi paṭisandhiyaṁ abhāveneva na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a49:1_17: tesaṁ vasenettha cakkhundriyamūlake naye yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a49:1_22: Gaṇentena vā moghapucchāvasena gaṇetabbānīti evaṁ tāva sabbavāresu pāḷivavatthānameva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_2: sacakkhukānaṁ na itthīnanti brahmapārisajjādīnañceva rūpīnaṁ purisanapuṁsakānañca vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_4: Sacakkhukānaṁ na purisānanti rūpībrahmānañceva itthinapuṁsakānañca vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_6: Acakkhukānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjatīti ekavokāracatuvokārakāmadhātusatte sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_7: Sacakkhukānaṁ vinā somanassenāti upekkhāsahagatānaṁ catunnaṁ mahāvipākapaṭisandhīnaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_8: Sacakkhukānaṁ vinā upekkhāyāti somanassasahagatapaṭisandhikānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_10: Ahetukānanti ahetukapaṭisandhicittena saddhiṁ saddhindriyādīnaṁ abhāvato vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_13: Sahetukānaṁ acakkhukānanti gabbhaseyyakavasena ceva arūpīvasena ca vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_14: Añño hi sahetuko acakkhuko nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a49:3_16: Sacakkhukānaṁ ñāṇavippayuttānanti kāmadhātuyaṁ duhetukapaṭisandhikānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_17: Sacakkhukānaṁ ñāṇasampayuttānanti rūpībrahmāno ceva kāmāvacaradevamanusse ca sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_18: Ñāṇasampayuttānaṁ acakkhukānanti arūpino ca tihetukagabbhaseyyake ca sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:4_1: Jīvitindriyamūlake vinā somanassena upapajjantānanti dvepi jīvitindriyāni sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:4_3: Iminā nayena sabbatthāpi paṭisandhipavattivasena jīvitindriyayojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a49:4_5: Paṭilomanaye pana nirodhavāre ca etesañceva aññesañca dhammānaṁ yathālābhavasena cutipaṭisandhipavattesu tīsupi anuppādanirodhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a49:5_3: Katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissantīti katici paṭisandhiyo gahetvā itthibhāvaṁ appatvāva parinibbāyissantīti attho.
atk-abh03a49:6_1: Paccuppannena atītavāre suddhāvāsānaṁ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca nuppajjitthāti cittayamake
atk-abh03a49:6_2: viya uppādakkhaṇātikkamavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā tasmiṁ bhave anuppannapubbavasena gahetabboti.
atk-abh03a49:6_3: Iminā nayamukhena sabbasmimpi pavattivāre atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a49:9_1: Pariññāvāre pana cakkhumūlakādīsu ekameva cakkhusotayamakaṁ dassitaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:9_2: Yasmā pana sesānipi lokiyaabyākatāni ceva lokiyaabyākatamissakāni ca pariññeyyāneva,
atk-abh03a49:9_3: tasmā tāni anupadiṭṭhānipi imināva dassitāni honti.
atk-abh03a49:9_12: Tesu eko samucchindituṁ asamatthattā domanassindriyaṁ na pajahati nāma.
atk-abh03a49:9_13: Eko pahīnadosattā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti anuppādaṁ āpādetuṁ asamatthatāya na parijānāti.
atk-abh03a49:17_0: Yamakaṁ nāma pakāsitaṁ, yamāmalalomena yaṁ tena.
atk-abh03a49:22_0: Niṭṭhaṁ pattā evaṁ, niṭṭhānaṁ pāpuṇantu sabbepi;
